title: Shapiro needs big policy wins for a 2028 run. He’s gunning for a Democratic trifecta to achieve them.
description: The Pennsylvania governor is mounting an aggressive down-ballot push this year alongside his reelection bid.
content: The Pennsylvania governor is mounting an aggressive down-ballot push this year alongside his reelection bid.
